mapper.select: SELECT PIECE_NO, MEMBER_NO, PIECE_TITLE, START_DATE, END_DATE, PIECE_RENAME FROM PIECE_AUCTION JOIN PIECE USING(PIECE_NO) WHERE PIECE_STATUS = 'F' AND PIECE_TYPE = 2 ORDER BY START_DATE DESC FETCH FIRST 4 ROWS ONLY

SELECT PIECE_NO, MEMBER_NO, PIECE_RENAME, PIECE_TITLE, SIZE_X, SIZE_Y, PIECE_CATEGORY_NO, ARTIST_NICKNAME, SELL_PRICE FROM PIECE JOIN ARTIST USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN PIECE_SELL USING(PIECE_NO) WHERE PIECE_TYPE = 1 ORDER BY PIECE_NO DESC FETCH FIRST 10 ROWS ONLY

SELECT PIECE_NO, MEMBER_NO, PIECE_RENAME, PIECE_TITLE, SIZE_X, SIZE_Y, PIECE_CATEGORY_NO, ARTIST_NICKNAME, START_PRICE, HOPE_PRICE FROM PIECE JOIN ARTIST USING(MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN PIECE_AUCTION USING(PIECE_NO) WHERE PIECE_TYPE = 2 AND PIECE_STATUS = 'S' ORDER BY PIECE_NO DESC FETCH FIRST 3 ROWS ONLY

SELECT PIECE_NO, MEMBER_NO, PIECE_RENAME, ARTIST_NICKNAME, PIECE_TITLE, SIZE_X, SIZE_Y, PIECE_CATEGORY_NO, PIECE_CATEGORY_NAME, START_PRICE, HOPE_PRICE, END_PRICE, PIECE_STATUS, START_DATE, END_DATE FROM PIECE JOIN ARTIST USING(MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN PIECE_AUCTION USING(PIECE_NO) LEFT JOIN PIECE_CATEGORY USING(PIECE_CATEGORY_NO) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MAX(END_PRICE) END_PRICE, PIECE_NO FROM AUCTION GROUP BY PIECE_NO ) USING(PIECE_NO) ORDER BY PIECE_NO DESC
